screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .rk file in RK Software WinRK
screenshot.caption: RK file open in RK Software WinRK

description: RK, also known as RK Archiver, and WinRK are archiving programs that were published by RK Software. These programs could save archives in several formats, including their native, proprietary RK format.

WinRK and RK Archiver compress RK files using several different compression algorithms, including PWCM, FPW, ROLZ2, ROLZ3, and others. In some cases, RK files are password-protected, to prevent unauthorized users from opening them.
NOTE: RK Software eventually changed its name to M Software.
